tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patient_Data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure_systolic INT,
  blood_pressure_diastolic INT,
  body_temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Alert_Log (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient_Data(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Provider_Alerts (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR,
  alert_id INT,
  read_status BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES Alert_Log(alert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE vitals (
    vital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE VitalSigns (
 vital_signs_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 heart_rate INT,
 blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
 temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
 alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 alert_message VARCHAR(255),
 alert_datetime TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AlertLog (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 alert_id INT,
 alert_status VARCHAR(20),
 alert_resolved BOOLEAN,
 alert_resolved_by VARCHAR(50),
 alert_resolved_datetime TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES Alerts(alert_id)
);
